data.text: (WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!)
data.processed: <story>(WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!)

data.text: Alright then, Trainer, I'll be off!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Alright then, Trainer, I'll be off!

data.text:
Alright, for this Selection Race…… 
Ah, there she is, Copano Rickey.
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Alright, for this Selection Race…… 
<story>Ah, there she is, Copano Rickey.

data.text:
Last time was "Turf", but this time she's participating on 
"Dirt"? What's her aptitude for it?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Last time was "Turf", but this time she's participating on 
<story>"Dirt"? What's her aptitude for it?

data.text:
Rickey……what's going on here? 
To think you'd suddenly challenge a dirt race.
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Rickey……what's going on here? 
<story>To think you'd suddenly challenge a dirt race.

data.text:
Don't tell me! You plan on pushing Feng 
Shui on to me even on the course!?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Don't tell me! You plan on pushing Feng 
<story>Shui on to me even on the course!?

data.text:
That's not it! It's just something I 
decided on after talking with Trainer.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>That's not it! It's just something I 
<story>decided on after talking with Trainer.

data.text:
It's possible 『Dirt might be a better option』, they said. 
Things like form and physique, and also……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>It's possible 『Dirt might be a better option』, they said. 
<story>Things like form and physique, and also……

data.text:
And above all, maybe dirt has better compatibility with Feng 
Shui. I won't know until I have a serious race, after all♪
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And above all, maybe dirt has better compatibility with Feng 
<story>Shui. I won't know until I have a serious race, after all♪

data.text:
Feng Shui's compatibility…… Rickey, don't take 
dirt lightly. Dirt is something that requires a 
steady accumulation of effort, day after day!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Feng Shui's compatibility…… Rickey, don't take 
<story>dirt lightly. Dirt is something that requires a 
<story>steady accumulation of effort, day after day!

data.text:
Rather than relying on charms, just like when you're tilling the 
earth in Hokkaido, if you don't do all you can, then victory will 
never come, you know?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Rather than relying on charms, just like when you're tilling the 
<story>earth in Hokkaido, if you don't do all you can, then victory will 
<story>never come, you know?

data.text:
I know. I've been working hard. 
And on top of that―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I know. I've been working hard. 
<story>And on top of that―

data.text: As long as I can hear the "Voice of the Earth"……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>As long as I can hear the "Voice of the Earth"……!

data.text:
Copano Rickey focused and entered her gate. 
And then the gates of fate opened.
data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey focused and entered her gate. 
<story>And then the gates of fate opened.

data.text:
(Alright, off to a good start! The bracket number, color, 
and direction are all compatible. And the feel of the dirt……)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(Alright, off to a good start! The bracket number, color, 
<story>and direction are all compatible. And the feel of the dirt……)

data.text:
(Yeah, it's good! When I run seriously…… 
I can sense the condition of the track clearly!)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(Yeah, it's good! When I run seriously…… 
<story>I can sense the condition of the track clearly!)

data.text:
(But that's not the most important part. The problem is― 
whether I can hear the "Voice of the Earth" or not)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(But that's not the most important part. The problem is― 
<story>whether I can hear the "Voice of the Earth" or not)

data.text:
(If I can't feel the flow of qi, then my run 
won't be blessed with luck. Please, somehow―!)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(If I can't feel the flow of qi, then my run 
<story>won't be blessed with luck. Please, somehow―!)

data.text:
(I need to take the course from further outside……! 
So I don't get hit by the dirt kicked up in front of me!)
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>(I need to take the course from further outside……! 
<story>So I don't get hit by the dirt kicked up in front of me!)

data.text:
(Today it feels like my legs are being held back～ 
I need to stabilize my breathing and save my stamina……)
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>(Today it feels like my legs are being held back～ 
<story>I need to stabilize my breathing and save my stamina……)

data.text:
(I can see it……! I can feel it……! The flow of qi. The Voice of 
the Earth……it's telling me how the race is developing)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(I can see it……! I can feel it……! The flow of qi. The Voice of 
<story>the Earth……it's telling me how the race is developing)

data.text:
(It's just like Trainer predicted. So that's how it was, 
Feng Shui has better compatibility with dirt!)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(It's just like Trainer predicted. So that's how it was, 
<story>Feng Shui has better compatibility with dirt!)

data.text:
Rickey, compared to before, she's so lively…… 
Trainer-san, what happened……?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Rickey, compared to before, she's so lively…… 
<story>Trainer-san, what happened……?

data.text: Sand? By sand, you mean the dirt?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed: <story>Sand? By sand, you mean the dirt?

data.text:
―Feng Shui is not something mystical, it's more like the study of 
environmental fortune. If that's true, then understading the 
conditions and location are important.
data.processed:
<story>―Feng Shui is not something mystical, it's more like the study of 
<story>environmental fortune. If that's true, then understading the 
<story>conditions and location are important.

data.text:
What conveyed that the most vividly was the "Sand". Whether it 
was the gravel on the grounds or the sand on the beach, dirt 
could show the flow of qi.
data.processed:
<story>What conveyed that the most vividly was the "Sand". Whether it 
<story>was the gravel on the grounds or the sand on the beach, dirt 
<story>could show the flow of qi.

data.text:
(Trainer! Yeah! Where should I take position? Da, 
Shin, Gon…… Alright, Shin! The qi is thin to the 
east, so I can run freely and pull away)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(Trainer! Yeah! Where should I take position? Da, 
<story>Shin, Gon…… Alright, Shin! The qi is thin to the 
<story>east, so I can run freely and pull away)

data.text:
(The five elements are balanced! From the Wood comes Fire, and 
the Fire returns everything to Soil! The place I should press the 
attack is just beyond that tree)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(The five elements are balanced! From the Wood comes Fire, and 
<story>the Fire returns everything to Soil! The place I should press the 
<story>attack is just beyond that tree)

data.text:
(The last straight! 『Physical』, 『Spiritual』……all are in harmony. 
The fortunes are aligned. All that's left is―)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(The last straight! 『Physical』, 『Spiritual』……all are in harmony. 
<story>The fortunes are aligned. All that's left is―)

data.text:
The fastest will win!! All the stamina I've been saving, I'll 
channel it and use everything I've got!! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>The fastest will win!! All the stamina I've been saving, I'll 
<story>channel it and use everything I've got!! 
<story>Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!

data.text: She's completely pulled ahead!? T-this run is……!!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed: <story>She's completely pulled ahead!? T-this run is……!!

data.text:
What's going on, wasn't this completely different from before!? 
Did something happen!?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>What's going on, wasn't this completely different from before!? 
<story>Did something happen!?

data.text:
Nothing happened. This is Copano Rickey's true strength. 
With proper preparation, and being able to see the 
flow of qi, this is how she can run.
data.processed:
<story>Nothing happened. This is Copano Rickey's true strength. 
<story>With proper preparation, and being able to see the 
<story>flow of qi, this is how she can run.

data.text: And with this, the Selection Race was over―
data.processed: <story>And with this, the Selection Race was over―

data.text:
Trainer, thank you. 
Because of you, I was able to have an awesome run☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Trainer, thank you. 
<story>Because of you, I was able to have an awesome run☆

data.text:
You were able to figure out the reason I couldn't 
hear the Voice of the Earth because you believed 
in Feng Shui, and thought about it!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>You were able to figure out the reason I couldn't 
<story>hear the Voice of the Earth because you believed 
<story>in Feng Shui, and thought about it!

data.text:
And with that, I want to spread the wonder of Feng Shui's power, 
and make all those that are down and lost happy, but―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And with that, I want to spread the wonder of Feng Shui's power, 
<story>and make all those that are down and lost happy, but―

data.text:
Will you lend me your strength? As my trainer! 
This time, you won't say No, right?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Will you lend me your strength? As my trainer! 
<story>This time, you won't say No, right?

data.text:
Alllllright! I was having a hard time finding someone, you see. 
Someone who believed in Feng Shui from the bottom of their heart, 
and wanted to make everyone happy☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Alllllright! I was having a hard time finding someone, you see. 
<story>Someone who believed in Feng Shui from the bottom of their heart, 
<story>and wanted to make everyone happy☆

data.text:
You and me are definitely 『In Harmony』! 
Meeting you has truly made me lucky and happy♪
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>You and me are definitely 『In Harmony』! 
<story>Meeting you has truly made me lucky and happy♪

data.text:
Mumumu……I never thought Rickey would be able to handle dirt. 
But after seeing her run today……
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Mumumu……I never thought Rickey would be able to handle dirt. 
<story>But after seeing her run today……

data.text:
Regardless of Feng Shui, she's definitely formidable……! 
But…… I won't lose!!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae
data.processed:
<story>Regardless of Feng Shui, she's definitely formidable……! 
<story>But…… I won't lose!!

data.text:
Yes, yes, truly. 
Perhaps I should join in and play too.
data.name: Wonder Acute
data.processed:
<story>Yes, yes, truly. 
<story>Perhaps I should join in and play too.

data.text:
Tarumae! Acute-san! 
Yeah, looking forward to it♪
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Tarumae! Acute-san! 
<story>Yeah, looking forward to it♪

data.text: I'll definitely use Feng Shui to make both of you happy☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>I'll definitely use Feng Shui to make both of you happy☆

data.text:
And with these strong rivals, she would enter the dirt 
curriculum. Copano Rickey's Happy Road had begun!
data.processed:
<story>And with these strong rivals, she would enter the dirt 
<story>curriculum. Copano Rickey's Happy Road had begun!
